subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sam Groth upset third-seeded Feliciano López, 3-6, 7-6 (5), 7-6 (6), in the second round of the Mercedes Cup in Stuttgart, Germany.
snippet: Sam Groth upset third-seeded Feliciano López, 3-6, 7-6 (5), 7-6 (6), in the second round of the Mercedes Cup in Stuttgart, Germany.
